sources.name: Employees1
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

transformations.name: NullFilter
transformations.description: Filter out NULLs from source file

sources.name: FactOrder
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FactOrder
